query: amiodarone adverse effects side effects safety profile atrial fibrillation thyroid pulmonary hepatic toxicity
title: Exploring current diagnosis and management of amiodarone-induced thyrotoxicosis
authors: Yudi Her Oktaviono, Ali Mustofa, Pandit Bagus Tri Saputra, Wynne Widiarti, Novia Nurul Faizah, Firas Farisi Alkaff
reference: Oktaviono, Y. H., Mustofa, A., Saputra, P. B. T., Widiarti, W., Faizah, N. N., & Alkaff, F. F. (2025). Exploring current diagnosis and management of amiodarone-induced thyrotoxicosis. The American Journal of Cardiology, 242, 75-81.
